00148 // 
00150 BOOL cvt_V792_open( cvt_V792_data* p_data, UINT16 base_address, long vme_handle, CVT_QTP_TYPES type)
00151 {
00152         memset( p_data, 0, sizeof( cvt_V792_data));
00153         // Check board type
00154         switch( type)
00155         {
00156         case CVT_V792_TYPE_A:                                                   
00157         case CVT_V792_TYPE_N:                                                   
00158         case CVT_V862_TYPE_A:                                                   
00159         case CVT_V965:                                                                  
00160         case CVT_V965_TYPE_A:                                                   
00161         case CVT_V785_TYPE_A:                                                   
00162         case CVT_V785_TYPE_N:                                                   
00163         case CVT_V1785:                                                                 
00164         case CVT_V775_TYPE_A:                                                   
00165         case CVT_V775_TYPE_N:                                                   
00167                 break;
00168         default:
00169                 TRACE1( "cvt_V792_open: bad board type: %d\n", type);
00170                 return FALSE;
00171         }
00172 
00173         // basic data initialization
00174         if( !cvt_board_open( &p_data->m_common_data, base_address, vme_handle, CVT_V792_REG_TABLE))
00175                 return FALSE;
00176         // board specific data initialization
00177         p_data->m_type= type;
00178         p_data->m_common_data.set_MCST_CBLT= ( BOOL (*)( void*, UINT8, MCST_CBLT_board_pos))cvt_V792_set_MCST_CBLT;
00179 
00180 #ifdef CVT_V792_USE_DATA_QUEUE
00181         p_data->m_queue= malloc( CVT_V792_QUEUE_SIZE_DWORD* sizeof( UINT32));   
00182         if( p_data->m_queue== NULL)
00183         {
00184                 TRACE( "cvt_V792_open: cannot allocate queue buffer\n");
00185                 return FALSE;
00186         }
00187         memset( p_data->m_queue, 0, CVT_V792_QUEUE_SIZE_DWORD* sizeof( UINT32));
00188 
00189 #endif
00190 
00191         return TRUE;
00192 }
00193 
00195 // 
00197 BOOL cvt_V792_close( cvt_V792_data* p_data)
00198 {
00199 #ifdef CVT_V792_USE_DATA_QUEUE
00200         if( p_data->m_queue!= NULL)
00201         {
00202                 free( p_data->m_queue);
00203         }
00204 #endif
00205         if( !cvt_board_close( &p_data->m_common_data))
00206                 return FALSE;
00207         return TRUE;
00208 }

00226 BOOL cvt_V792_set_geo_address( cvt_V792_data* p_data, UINT8 value)
00227 {
00228         UINT16 reg_value= value;
00229         // write register
00230         if( !cvt_write_reg( &p_data->m_common_data, CVT_V792_GEO_ADDRESS_INDEX, &reg_value))
00231         {
00232                 TRACE( "V792 CVT_V792_GEO_ADDRESS write failed !\n");
00233                 return FALSE;
00234         }
00235         return TRUE;
00236 }
00237 
00239 // 
00241 BOOL cvt_V792_get_geo_address( cvt_V792_data* p_data, UINT8 *p_value)
00242 {
00243         UINT16 reg_value= 0;
00244         // read register
00245         if( !cvt_read_reg( &p_data->m_common_data, CVT_V792_GEO_ADDRESS_INDEX, &reg_value))
00246         {
00247                 TRACE( "V792 CVT_V792_GEO_ADDRESS read failed !\n");
00248                 return FALSE;
00249         }
00250         *p_value= (UINT8)((UINT16)( reg_value& 0x1f));
00251         return TRUE;
00252 }
00253

00425 // 
00427 BOOL cvt_V792_set_bitmask_control_1( cvt_V792_data* p_data, CVT_V792_CONTROL_1_MSK value)
00428 {
00429         UINT16 reg_value= value;
00430         // set bitmask to register
00431         if( !cvt_set_bitmask( &p_data->m_common_data, CVT_V792_CONTROL_1_ADD, &reg_value, CVT_V792_CONTROL_1_AM, CVT_V792_CONTROL_1_DATA_SIZE))
00432         {
00433                 TRACE( "V792 CVT_V792_CONTROL_1_SET failed !\n");
00434                 return FALSE;
00435         }
00436         return TRUE;
00437 }

00440 // 
00442 BOOL cvt_V792_clear_bitmask_control_1( cvt_V792_data* p_data, CVT_V792_CONTROL_1_MSK value)
00443 {
00444         UINT16 reg_value= value;
00445         // set bitmask to register
00446         if( !cvt_clear_bitmask( &p_data->m_common_data, CVT_V792_CONTROL_1_ADD, &reg_value, CVT_V792_CONTROL_1_AM, CVT_V792_CONTROL_1_DATA_SIZE))
00447         {
00448                 TRACE( "V792 CVT_V792_CONTROL_1_CLEAR failed !\n");
00449                 return FALSE;
00450         }
00451         return TRUE;
00452 }

00609 
00611 // 
00613 BOOL cvt_V792_set_threshold( cvt_V792_data* p_data, cvt_V792_threshold_id threshold_id, UINT16 value)
00614 {
00615         UINT16 reg_value= value;
00616         int max_thresholds= 0;
00617         int address_shift= 0;
00618         switch( p_data->m_type)
00619         {
00620         case CVT_V792_TYPE_A:                                                   
00621                 address_shift= 0;
00622                 break;
00623         case CVT_V792_TYPE_N:                                                   
00624                 address_shift= 1;
00625                 break;
00626         case CVT_V862_TYPE_A:                                                   
00627                 address_shift= 0;
00628                 break;
00629         case CVT_V785_TYPE_A:                                                   
00630                 address_shift= 0;
00631                 break;
00632         case CVT_V785_TYPE_N:                                                   
00633                 address_shift= 1;
00634                 break;
00635         case CVT_V775_TYPE_A:                                                   
00636                 address_shift= 0;
00637                 break;
00638         case CVT_V775_TYPE_N:                                                   
00639                 address_shift= 1;
00640                 break;
00641         default:
00642                 TRACE1( "cvt_V792_set_threshold: bad board type: %d\n", p_data->m_type);
00643                 return FALSE;
00644         }
00645         max_thresholds= CVT_QTP_NUM_CHANNELS[ p_data->m_type];
00646 
00647         // Parameter checking
00648         switch( threshold_id)
00649         {
00650         case CVT_V792_THRESHOLD_ALL:                                            // Catch all the thresholds
00651                 {
00652                         // write all the thresholds
00653                         int i;
00654                         for( i= CVT_V792_THRESHOLD_0; i< max_thresholds; i++)
00655                         {
00656                                 if( !cvt_write_reg( &p_data->m_common_data, CVT_V792_THRESHOLD_0_INDEX+ ((i- CVT_V792_THRESHOLD_0)<< address_shift), &reg_value))
00657                                 {
00658                                         TRACE1( "V792 THRESHOLD %i write failed !\n", i- CVT_V792_THRESHOLD_0);
00659                                         return FALSE;
00660                                 }
00661                         }
00662                 }
00663                 break;
00664         case CVT_V792_THRESHOLD_0:                                                      // Threshold 0 register
00665         case CVT_V792_THRESHOLD_1:                                                      // Threshold 1 register
00666         case CVT_V792_THRESHOLD_2:                                                      // Threshold 2 register
00667         case CVT_V792_THRESHOLD_3:                                                      // Threshold 3 register
00668         case CVT_V792_THRESHOLD_4:                                                      // Threshold 4 register
00669         case CVT_V792_THRESHOLD_5:                                                      // Threshold 5 register
00670         case CVT_V792_THRESHOLD_6:                                                      // Threshold 6 register
00671         case CVT_V792_THRESHOLD_7:                                                      // Threshold 7 register
00672         case CVT_V792_THRESHOLD_8:                                                      // Threshold 8 register
00673         case CVT_V792_THRESHOLD_9:                                                      // Threshold 9 register
00674         case CVT_V792_THRESHOLD_10:                                                     // Threshold 10 register
00675         case CVT_V792_THRESHOLD_11:                                                     // Threshold 11 register
00676         case CVT_V792_THRESHOLD_12:                                                     // Threshold 12 register
00677         case CVT_V792_THRESHOLD_13:                                                     // Threshold 13 register
00678         case CVT_V792_THRESHOLD_14:                                                     // Threshold 14 register
00679         case CVT_V792_THRESHOLD_15:                                                     // Threshold 15 register
00680         case CVT_V792_THRESHOLD_16:                                                     // Threshold 16 register (V792 only)
00681         case CVT_V792_THRESHOLD_17:                                                     // Threshold 17 register (V792 only)
00682         case CVT_V792_THRESHOLD_18:                                                     // Threshold 18 register (V792 only)
00683         case CVT_V792_THRESHOLD_19:                                                     // Threshold 19 register (V792 only)
00684         case CVT_V792_THRESHOLD_20:                                                     // Threshold 20 register (V792 only)
00685         case CVT_V792_THRESHOLD_21:                                                     // Threshold 21 register (V792 only)
00686         case CVT_V792_THRESHOLD_22:                                                     // Threshold 22 register (V792 only)
00687         case CVT_V792_THRESHOLD_23:                                                     // Threshold 23 register (V792 only)
00688         case CVT_V792_THRESHOLD_24:                                                     // Threshold 24 register (V792 only)
00689         case CVT_V792_THRESHOLD_25:                                                     // Threshold 25 register (V792 only)
00690         case CVT_V792_THRESHOLD_26:                                                     // Threshold 26 register (V792 only)
00691         case CVT_V792_THRESHOLD_27:                                                     // Threshold 27 register (V792 only)
00692         case CVT_V792_THRESHOLD_28:                                                     // Threshold 28 register (V792 only)
00693         case CVT_V792_THRESHOLD_29:                                                     // Threshold 29 register (V792 only)
00694         case CVT_V792_THRESHOLD_30:                                                     // Threshold 30 register (V792 only)
00695         case CVT_V792_THRESHOLD_31:                                                     // Threshold 31 register (V792 only)
00696                 if( ( threshold_id- CVT_V792_THRESHOLD_0)>= max_thresholds)
00697                         return FALSE;
00698                 // write specific threshold
00699                 if( !cvt_write_reg( &p_data->m_common_data, CVT_V792_THRESHOLD_0_INDEX+ (( threshold_id- CVT_V792_THRESHOLD_0)<< address_shift), &reg_value))
00700                 {
00701                         TRACE1( "V792 THRESHOLD %i write failed !\n", threshold_id- CVT_V792_THRESHOLD_0);
00702                         return FALSE;
00703                 }
00704                 break;
00705         default:
00706                 TRACE1( "V792 Unhandled threshold id %i !\n", threshold_id);
00707                 return FALSE;
00708         }
00709         return TRUE;
00710 }
00711 
00712 
00714 // 
00716 BOOL cvt_V792_set_dual_range_threshold( cvt_V792_data* p_data, cvt_V792_threshold_id threshold_id, UINT16 value_high, UINT16 value_low)
00717 {
00718         int max_thresholds= 0;
00719         int address_shift= 0;
00720 
00721         switch( p_data->m_type)
00722         {
00723         case CVT_V965:                                                                  
00724                 address_shift= 1;
00725                 break;
00726         case CVT_V965_TYPE_A:                                                   
00727                 address_shift= 2;
00728                 break;
00729         case CVT_V1785:                                                                 
00730                 address_shift= 2;
00731                 break;
00732         default:
00733                 TRACE1( "cvt_V792_set_dual_range_threshold: bad board type: %d\n", p_data->m_type);
00734                 return FALSE;
00735         }
00736         max_thresholds= CVT_QTP_NUM_CHANNELS[ p_data->m_type];
00737 
00738         // Parameter checking
00739         switch( threshold_id)
00740         {
00741         case CVT_V792_THRESHOLD_ALL:                                            // Catch all the thresholds
00742                 {
00743                         // write all the thresholds
00744                         int i;
00745                         for( i= CVT_V792_THRESHOLD_0; i< max_thresholds; i++)
00746                         {
00747                                 if( !cvt_write_reg( &p_data->m_common_data, CVT_V792_THRESHOLD_0_INDEX+ ((i- CVT_V792_THRESHOLD_0)<< address_shift), &value_high))
00748                                 {
00749                                         TRACE1( "V792 THRESHOLD %i write failed !\n", i- CVT_V792_THRESHOLD_0);
00750                                         return FALSE;
00751                                 }
00752                                 if( !cvt_write_reg( &p_data->m_common_data, CVT_V792_THRESHOLD_0_INDEX+ ((i- CVT_V792_THRESHOLD_0)<< address_shift)+ ( 1<< ( address_shift- 1)), &value_low))
00753                                 {
00754                                         TRACE1( "V792 THRESHOLD %i write failed !\n", i- CVT_V792_THRESHOLD_0);
00755                                         return FALSE;
00756                                 }
00757                         }
00758                 }
00759                 break;
00760         case CVT_V792_THRESHOLD_0:                                                      // Threshold 0 register
00761         case CVT_V792_THRESHOLD_1:                                                      // Threshold 1 register
00762         case CVT_V792_THRESHOLD_2:                                                      // Threshold 2 register
00763         case CVT_V792_THRESHOLD_3:                                                      // Threshold 3 register
00764         case CVT_V792_THRESHOLD_4:                                                      // Threshold 4 register
00765         case CVT_V792_THRESHOLD_5:                                                      // Threshold 5 register
00766         case CVT_V792_THRESHOLD_6:                                                      // Threshold 6 register
00767         case CVT_V792_THRESHOLD_7:                                                      // Threshold 7 register
00768         case CVT_V792_THRESHOLD_8:                                                      // Threshold 8 register
00769         case CVT_V792_THRESHOLD_9:                                                      // Threshold 9 register
00770         case CVT_V792_THRESHOLD_10:                                                     // Threshold 10 register
00771         case CVT_V792_THRESHOLD_11:                                                     // Threshold 11 register
00772         case CVT_V792_THRESHOLD_12:                                                     // Threshold 12 register
00773         case CVT_V792_THRESHOLD_13:                                                     // Threshold 13 register
00774         case CVT_V792_THRESHOLD_14:                                                     // Threshold 14 register
00775         case CVT_V792_THRESHOLD_15:                                                     // Threshold 15 register
00776         case CVT_V792_THRESHOLD_16:                                                     // Threshold 16 register (V792 only)
00777         case CVT_V792_THRESHOLD_17:                                                     // Threshold 17 register (V792 only)
00778         case CVT_V792_THRESHOLD_18:                                                     // Threshold 18 register (V792 only)
00779         case CVT_V792_THRESHOLD_19:                                                     // Threshold 19 register (V792 only)
00780         case CVT_V792_THRESHOLD_20:                                                     // Threshold 20 register (V792 only)
00781         case CVT_V792_THRESHOLD_21:                                                     // Threshold 21 register (V792 only)
00782         case CVT_V792_THRESHOLD_22:                                                     // Threshold 22 register (V792 only)
00783         case CVT_V792_THRESHOLD_23:                                                     // Threshold 23 register (V792 only)
00784         case CVT_V792_THRESHOLD_24:                                                     // Threshold 24 register (V792 only)
00785         case CVT_V792_THRESHOLD_25:                                                     // Threshold 25 register (V792 only)
00786         case CVT_V792_THRESHOLD_26:                                                     // Threshold 26 register (V792 only)
00787         case CVT_V792_THRESHOLD_27:                                                     // Threshold 27 register (V792 only)
00788         case CVT_V792_THRESHOLD_28:                                                     // Threshold 28 register (V792 only)
00789         case CVT_V792_THRESHOLD_29:                                                     // Threshold 29 register (V792 only)
00790         case CVT_V792_THRESHOLD_30:                                                     // Threshold 30 register (V792 only)
00791         case CVT_V792_THRESHOLD_31:                                                     // Threshold 31 register (V792 only)
00792                 if( ( threshold_id- CVT_V792_THRESHOLD_0)>= max_thresholds)
00793                         return FALSE;
00794                 // write specific threshold
00795                 if( !cvt_write_reg( &p_data->m_common_data, CVT_V792_THRESHOLD_0_INDEX+ (( threshold_id- CVT_V792_THRESHOLD_0)<< address_shift), &value_high))
00796                 {
00797                         TRACE1( "V792 THRESHOLD %i write failed !\n", threshold_id- CVT_V792_THRESHOLD_0);
00798                         return FALSE;
00799                 }
00800                 if( !cvt_write_reg( &p_data->m_common_data, CVT_V792_THRESHOLD_0_INDEX+ (( threshold_id- CVT_V792_THRESHOLD_0)<< address_shift)+ ( 1<< ( address_shift- 1)), &value_low))
00801                 {
00802                         TRACE1( "V792 THRESHOLD %i write failed !\n", threshold_id- CVT_V792_THRESHOLD_0);
00803                         return FALSE;
00804                 }
00805                 break;
00806         default:
00807                 TRACE1( "V792 Unhandled threshold id %i !\n", threshold_id);
00808                 return FALSE;
00809         }
00810         return TRUE;
00811 }

00844 //
00845 //     L E V E L   2   A P I s
00846 //
00848 
00850 // 
00852 BOOL cvt_V792_set_sliding_scale( cvt_V792_data* p_data, BOOL enable)
00853 {
00854         UINT16 reg_value;
00855         reg_value= CVT_V792_BSC2_SLIDE_EN_MSK;
00856         // set the sliding scale enable bit
00857         if( !cvt_write_reg( &p_data->m_common_data, enable? CVT_V792_BIT_SET_2_INDEX: CVT_V792_BIT_CLEAR_2_INDEX, &reg_value))
00858         {
00859                 TRACE( "V792 CVT_V792_BSC2_SLIDE_EN_MSK bit set failed !\n");
00860                 return FALSE;
00861         }
00862         return TRUE;
00863 }
00864 
00866 //
00868 BOOL cvt_V792_set_zero_suppression( cvt_V792_data* p_data, BOOL enable, BOOL step_threshold, const UINT16* thresholds_buff)
00869 {
00870         UINT16 reg_value;
00871         int max_thresholds= 0;
00872         int address_shift= 0;
00873         switch( p_data->m_type)
00874         {
00875         case CVT_V792_TYPE_A:                                                   
00876                 address_shift= 0;
00877                 break;
00878         case CVT_V792_TYPE_N:                                                   
00879                 address_shift= 1;
00880                 break;
00881         case CVT_V862_TYPE_A:                                                   
00882                 address_shift= 0;
00883                 break;
00884         case CVT_V785_TYPE_A:                                                   
00885                 address_shift= 0;
00886                 break;
00887         case CVT_V785_TYPE_N:                                                   
00888                 address_shift= 1;
00889                 break;
00890         case CVT_V775_TYPE_A:                                                   
00891                 address_shift= 0;
00892                 break;
00893         case CVT_V775_TYPE_N:                                                   
00894                 address_shift= 1;
00895                 break;
00896         default:
00897                 TRACE1( "cvt_V792_set_zero_suppression: bad board type: %d\n", p_data->m_type);
00898                 return FALSE;
00899         }
00900         max_thresholds= CVT_QTP_NUM_CHANNELS[ p_data->m_type];
00901 
00902         if( !enable)
00903         {
00904                 // Set the low threshold disable bit
00905                 reg_value= CVT_V792_BSC2_LOW_THR_DIS_MSK;
00906                 if( !cvt_write_reg( &p_data->m_common_data, CVT_V792_BIT_SET_2_INDEX, &reg_value))
00907                 {
00908                         TRACE( "V792 CVT_V792_BSC2_LOW_THR_DIS_MSK bit set failed !\n");
00909                         return FALSE;
00910                 }
00911         }
00912         else
00913         {
00914                 // setup thresholds
00915                 reg_value= CVT_V792_BSC2_LOW_THR_DIS_MSK;
00916                 if( thresholds_buff!= NULL)
00917                 {
00918                         int i;
00919                         // write all the thresholds
00920                         for( i= CVT_V792_THRESHOLD_0; i< max_thresholds; i++)
00921                         {
00922                                 if( !cvt_write_reg( &p_data->m_common_data, CVT_V792_THRESHOLD_0_INDEX+ ((i- CVT_V792_THRESHOLD_0)<< address_shift), thresholds_buff++))
00923                                 {
00924                                         TRACE1( "V792 THRESHOLD %i write failed !\n", i- CVT_V792_THRESHOLD_0);
00925                                         return FALSE;
00926                                 }
00927                         }
00928                 }
00929 
00930                 // Clear the step threshold bit
00931                 reg_value= CVT_V792_BSC2_STEP_TH_MSK;
00932                 if( step_threshold)
00933                 {
00934                         if( !cvt_write_reg( &p_data->m_common_data, CVT_V792_BIT_SET_2_INDEX, &reg_value))
00935                         {
00936                                 TRACE( "V792 CVT_V792_BSC2_STEP_TH_MSK bit set failed !\n");
00937                                 return FALSE;
00938                         }
00939                 }
00940                 else
00941                 {
00942                         if( !cvt_write_reg( &p_data->m_common_data, CVT_V792_BIT_CLEAR_2_INDEX, &reg_value))
00943                         {
00944                                 TRACE( "V792 CVT_V792_BSC2_STEP_TH_MSK bit clear failed !\n");
00945                                 return FALSE;
00946                         }
00947                 }
00948 
00949                 // clear the low threshold disable bit
00950                 reg_value= CVT_V792_BSC2_LOW_THR_DIS_MSK;
00951                 if( !cvt_write_reg( &p_data->m_common_data, CVT_V792_BIT_CLEAR_2_INDEX, &reg_value))
00952                 {
00953                         TRACE( "V792 CVT_V792_BSC2_LOW_THR_DIS_MSK bit clear failed !\n");
00954                         return FALSE;
00955                 }
00956         }
00957         return TRUE;
00958 }
00959 
00961 //
00963 CVT_DLL_API BOOL cvt_V792_set_dual_range_zero_suppression( cvt_V792_data* p_data, BOOL enable, BOOL step_threshold, const UINT16* thresholds_buff_high, const UINT16* thresholds_buff_low)
00964 {
00965         UINT16 reg_value;
00966         int max_thresholds= 0;
00967         int address_shift= 0;
00968 
00969         switch( p_data->m_type)
00970         {
00971         case CVT_V965:                                                                  
00972                 address_shift= 1;
00973                 break;
00974         case CVT_V965_TYPE_A:                                                   
00975                 address_shift= 2;
00976                 break;
00977         case CVT_V1785:                                                                 
00978                 address_shift= 2;
00979                 break;
00980         default:
00981                 TRACE1( "cvt_V792_set_dual_range_threshold: bad board type: %d\n", p_data->m_type);
00982                 return FALSE;
00983         }
00984         max_thresholds= CVT_QTP_NUM_CHANNELS[ p_data->m_type];
00985         if( !enable)
00986         {
00987                 // Set the low threshold disable bit
00988                 reg_value= CVT_V792_BSC2_LOW_THR_DIS_MSK;
00989                 if( !cvt_write_reg( &p_data->m_common_data, CVT_V792_BIT_SET_2_INDEX, &reg_value))
00990                 {
00991                         TRACE( "V792 CVT_V792_BSC2_LOW_THR_DIS_MSK bit set failed !\n");
00992                         return FALSE;
00993                 }
00994         }
00995         else
00996         {
00997                 // setup thresholds
00998                 reg_value= CVT_V792_BSC2_LOW_THR_DIS_MSK;
00999                 if( thresholds_buff_high!= NULL)
01000                 {
01001                         int i;
01002                         // write all the thresholds
01003                         for( i= CVT_V792_THRESHOLD_0; i< max_thresholds; i++)
01004                         {
01005                                 if( !cvt_write_reg( &p_data->m_common_data, CVT_V792_THRESHOLD_0_INDEX+ (( i- CVT_V792_THRESHOLD_0)<< address_shift), thresholds_buff_high++))
01006                                 {
01007                                         TRACE1( "V792 THRESHOLD %i write failed !\n", threshold_id- CVT_V792_THRESHOLD_0);
01008                                         return FALSE;
01009                                 }
01010                         }
01011                 }
01012                 if( thresholds_buff_low!= NULL)
01013                 {
01014                         int i;
01015                         // write all the thresholds
01016                         for( i= CVT_V792_THRESHOLD_0; i< max_thresholds; i++)
01017                         {
01018                                 if( !cvt_write_reg( &p_data->m_common_data, CVT_V792_THRESHOLD_0_INDEX+ (( i- CVT_V792_THRESHOLD_0)<< address_shift)+ ( 1<< ( address_shift- 1)), thresholds_buff_low++))
01019                                 {
01020                                         TRACE1( "V792 THRESHOLD %i write failed !\n", threshold_id- CVT_V792_THRESHOLD_0);
01021                                         return FALSE;
01022                                 }
01023                         }
01024                 }
01025 
01026                 // Clear the step threshold bit
01027                 reg_value= CVT_V792_BSC2_STEP_TH_MSK;
01028                 if( step_threshold)
01029                 {
01030                         if( !cvt_write_reg( &p_data->m_common_data, CVT_V792_BIT_SET_2_INDEX, &reg_value))
01031                         {
01032                                 TRACE( "V792 CVT_V792_BSC2_STEP_TH_MSK bit set failed !\n");
01033                                 return FALSE;
01034                         }
01035                 }
01036                 else
01037                 {
01038                         if( !cvt_write_reg( &p_data->m_common_data, CVT_V792_BIT_CLEAR_2_INDEX, &reg_value))
01039                         {
01040                                 TRACE( "V792 CVT_V792_BSC2_STEP_TH_MSK bit clear failed !\n");
01041                                 return FALSE;
01042                         }
01043                 }
01044 
01045                 // clear the low threshold disable bit
01046                 reg_value= CVT_V792_BSC2_LOW_THR_DIS_MSK;
01047                 if( !cvt_write_reg( &p_data->m_common_data, CVT_V792_BIT_CLEAR_2_INDEX, &reg_value))
01048                 {
01049                         TRACE( "V792 CVT_V792_BSC2_LOW_THR_DIS_MSK bit clear failed !\n");
01050                         return FALSE;
01051                 }
01052         }
01053         return TRUE;
01054 }
01055 
01057 //
01059 BOOL cvt_V792_set_overflow_suppression( cvt_V792_data* p_data, BOOL enable)
01060 {
01061         UINT16 reg_value;
01062 
01063         // Overflow suppression disable bit
01064         reg_value= CVT_V792_BSC2_OVER_RANGE_DIS_MSK;
01065         if( !enable)
01066         {
01067                 // Set the Overflow suppression disable bit
01068                 if( !cvt_write_reg( &p_data->m_common_data, CVT_V792_BIT_SET_2_INDEX, &reg_value))
01069                 {
01070                         TRACE( "V792 CVT_V792_BSC2_OVER_RANGE_DIS_MSK bit set failed !\n");
01071                         return FALSE;
01072                 }
01073         }
01074         else
01075         {
01076                 // Clear the Overflow suppression disable bit
01077                 if( !cvt_write_reg( &p_data->m_common_data, CVT_V792_BIT_CLEAR_2_INDEX, &reg_value))
01078                 {
01079                         TRACE( "V792 CVT_V792_BSC2_OVER_RANGE_DIS_MSK bit clear failed !\n");
01080                         return FALSE;
01081                 }
01082         }
01083         return TRUE;
01084 }
01085 
01087 //
01089 BOOL cvt_V792_set_MEB( cvt_V792_data* p_data, BOOL empty_enable, BOOL auto_incr_enable)
01090 {
01091         UINT16 reg_value;
01092 
01093         // Empty enable bit
01094         reg_value= CVT_V792_BSC2_EMPTY_EN_MSK;
01095         if( !empty_enable)
01096         {
01097                 // Clear the empty enable bit
01098                 if( !cvt_write_reg( &p_data->m_common_data, CVT_V792_BIT_CLEAR_2_INDEX, &reg_value))
01099                 {
01100                         TRACE( "V792 CVT_V792_BSC2_EMPTY_EN_MSK bit clear failed !\n");
01101                         return FALSE;
01102                 }
01103         }
01104         else
01105         {
01106                 // Set the empty enable bit
01107                 if( !cvt_write_reg( &p_data->m_common_data, CVT_V792_BIT_SET_2_INDEX, &reg_value))
01108                 {
01109                         TRACE( "V792 CVT_V792_BSC2_EMPTY_EN_MSK bit set failed !\n");
01110                         return FALSE;
01111                 }
01112         }
01113         // Auto increment enable bit
01114         reg_value= CVT_V792_BSC2_AUTO_INC_MSK;
01115         if( !auto_incr_enable)
01116         {
01117                 // Clear the auto increment enable bit
01118                 if( !cvt_write_reg( &p_data->m_common_data, CVT_V792_BIT_CLEAR_2_INDEX, &reg_value))
01119                 {
01120                         TRACE( "V792 CVT_V792_BSC2_AUTO_INC_MSK bit clear failed !\n");
01121                         return FALSE;
01122                 }
01123         }
01124         else
01125         {
01126                 // Set the empty enable bit
01127                 if( !cvt_write_reg( &p_data->m_common_data, CVT_V792_BIT_SET_2_INDEX, &reg_value))
01128                 {
01129                         TRACE( "V792 CVT_V792_BSC2_AUTO_INC_MSK bit set failed !\n");
01130                         return FALSE;
01131                 }
01132         }
01133         return TRUE;
01134 }
01135 
01137 //
01139 BOOL cvt_V792_set_event_counter( cvt_V792_data* p_data, BOOL count_all_events, BOOL reset_count)
01140 {
01141         UINT16 reg_value;
01142 
01143         // Count All events enable bit
01144         reg_value= CVT_V792_BSC2_ALL_TRG_MSK;
01145         if( !count_all_events)
01146         {
01147                 // Clear the Count All events enable bit
01148                 if( !cvt_write_reg( &p_data->m_common_data, CVT_V792_BIT_CLEAR_2_INDEX, &reg_value))
01149                 {
01150                         TRACE( "V792 CVT_V792_BSC2_ALL_TRG_MSK bit clear failed !\n");
01151                         return FALSE;
01152                 }
01153         }
01154         else
01155         {
01156                 // Set the Count All events enable bit
01157                 if( !cvt_write_reg( &p_data->m_common_data, CVT_V792_BIT_SET_2_INDEX, &reg_value))
01158                 {
01159                         TRACE( "V792 CVT_V792_BSC2_ALL_TRG_MSK bit set failed !\n");
01160                         return FALSE;
01161                 }
01162         }
01163         
01164         // Counter reset
01165         reg_value= 0;
01166         if( reset_count)
01167         {
01168                 // Resets the counter
01169                 if( !cvt_write_reg( &p_data->m_common_data, CVT_V792_EVENT_COUNT_RESET_INDEX, &reg_value))
01170                 {
01171                         TRACE( "V792 CVT_V792_EVENT_COUNT_RESET write failed !\n");
01172                         return FALSE;
01173                 }
01174         }
01175         return TRUE;
01176 }
01177 
01179 // 
01181 BOOL cvt_V792_read_MEB( cvt_V792_data* p_data, void* p_buff, UINT32* p_buff_size)
01182 {
01183         BOOL is_berr= FALSE;
01184         if( !cvt_FIFO_BLT_read( &p_data->m_common_data, CVT_V792_OUT_BUFFER_ADD, p_buff, *p_buff_size, p_buff_size, CVT_V792_OUT_BUFFER_AM, CVT_V792_OUT_BUFFER_DATA_SIZE, &is_berr))
01185         {
01186                 return FALSE;
01187         }
01188         // V792 return an invalid datum if output buffer empty, so discard it
01189         if( *p_buff_size== sizeof( UINT32))
01190         {
01191                 if( CVT_QTP_IS_NOT_VALID_DATUM( *((UINT32*)p_buff)))
01192                         *p_buff_size= 0;
01193         }
01194         return TRUE;
01195 }

01198 // 
01200 BOOL cvt_V792_set_fast_clear_window( cvt_V792_data* p_data, UINT16 value)
01201 {
01202         UINT16 reg_value= value;
01203         // write register
01204         if( !cvt_write_reg( &p_data->m_common_data, CVT_V792_FCLR_WND_INDEX, &reg_value))
01205         {
01206                 TRACE( "V792 CVT_V792_FCLR_WND write failed !\n");
01207                 return FALSE;
01208         }
01209         return TRUE;
01210 }
01211 
01213 //
01215 BOOL cvt_V792_set_acquisition_mode( cvt_V792_data* p_data, BOOL sliding_scale_enable, BOOL zero_suppression_enable, BOOL overflow_suppression_enable, BOOL valid_suppression_enable, BOOL common_stop_enable, BOOL empty_enable, BOOL count_all_events)
01216 {
01217         UINT16 set_msk= 0;
01218         UINT16 clear_msk= 0;
01219 
01220         //
01221         // Sliding scale
01222         set_msk|= ( sliding_scale_enable)? CVT_V792_BSC2_SLIDE_EN_MSK: 0;
01223         clear_msk|= ( sliding_scale_enable)? 0: CVT_V792_BSC2_SLIDE_EN_MSK;
01224         //
01225         // zero suppression enable bit
01226         set_msk|= ( zero_suppression_enable)? 0: CVT_V792_BSC2_LOW_THR_DIS_MSK;
01227         clear_msk|= ( zero_suppression_enable)? CVT_V792_BSC2_LOW_THR_DIS_MSK: 0;
01228         //
01229         // Overflow suppression disable bit
01230         set_msk|= ( overflow_suppression_enable)? 0: CVT_V792_BSC2_OVER_RANGE_DIS_MSK;
01231         clear_msk|= ( overflow_suppression_enable)? CVT_V792_BSC2_OVER_RANGE_DIS_MSK: 0;
01232 
01233 
01234         //
01235         // valid suppression disable bit
01236         set_msk|= ( valid_suppression_enable)? 0: CVT_V792_BSC2_VALID_DIS_MSK;
01237         clear_msk|= ( valid_suppression_enable)? CVT_V792_BSC2_VALID_DIS_MSK: 0;
01238 
01239         //
01240         // common stop disable bit
01241         clear_msk|= ( common_stop_enable)? 0: CVT_V792_BSC2_COMMON_STOP_MSK;
01242         set_msk|= ( common_stop_enable)? CVT_V792_BSC2_COMMON_STOP_MSK: 0;
01243         //
01244         // Empty enable bit
01245         set_msk|= ( empty_enable)? CVT_V792_BSC2_EMPTY_EN_MSK: 0;
01246         clear_msk|= ( empty_enable)? 0: CVT_V792_BSC2_EMPTY_EN_MSK;
01247         //
01248         // All trigger bit (count all events)
01249         set_msk|= ( count_all_events)? CVT_V792_BSC2_ALL_TRG_MSK: 0;
01250         clear_msk|= ( count_all_events)? 0: CVT_V792_BSC2_ALL_TRG_MSK;
01251         
01252         //
01253         // bitmask set
01254         if( set_msk)
01255         {
01256                 if( !cvt_write_reg( &p_data->m_common_data, CVT_V792_BIT_SET_2_INDEX, &set_msk))
01257                 {
01258                         TRACE( "V792 CVT_V792_BIT_SET_2 write failed !\n");
01259                         return FALSE;
01260                 }
01261         }
01262         //
01263         // bitmask clear
01264         if( clear_msk)
01265         {
01266                 // clear the enable bit
01267                 if( !cvt_write_reg( &p_data->m_common_data, CVT_V792_BIT_CLEAR_2_INDEX, &clear_msk))
01268                 {
01269                         TRACE( "V792 CVT_V792_BIT_CLEAR_2 write failed !\n");
01270                         return FALSE;
01271                 }
01272         }
01273         return TRUE;
01274 }
01276 //
01278 BOOL cvt_V792_set_interrupt( cvt_V792_data* p_data, UINT8 level, UINT8 vector, UINT8 event_number)
01279 {
01280         UINT16 reg_value;
01281         //
01282         // interrupt level
01283         reg_value= level& 0x07;
01284         if( level!= reg_value)
01285         {
01286                 TRACE( "V792 bad interrupt level !\n");
01287                 return FALSE;
01288         }
01289         if( !cvt_write_reg( &p_data->m_common_data, CVT_V792_INT_LEVEL_INDEX, &reg_value))
01290         {
01291                 TRACE( "V792 CVT_V792_INT_LEVEL write failed !\n");
01292                 return FALSE;
01293         }
01294         //
01295         // interrupt vector
01296         reg_value= vector;
01297         if( !cvt_write_reg( &p_data->m_common_data, CVT_V792_INT_VECTOR_INDEX, &reg_value))
01298         {
01299                 TRACE( "V792 CVT_V792_INT_VECTOR write failed !\n");
01300                 return FALSE;
01301         }
01302         //
01303         // event number (event trigger register)
01304         reg_value= event_number& 0x1f;
01305         if( event_number!= reg_value)
01306         {
01307                 TRACE( "V792 bad interrupt event number !\n");
01308                 return FALSE;
01309         }
01310         if( !cvt_write_reg( &p_data->m_common_data, CVT_V792_EVENT_TRG_INDEX, &reg_value))
01311         {
01312                 TRACE( "V792 CVT_V792_EVENT_TRG write failed !\n");
01313                 return FALSE;
01314         }
01315         return TRUE;
01316 }
01317 
01319 //
01321 BOOL cvt_V792_set_readout_mode( cvt_V792_data* p_data, BOOL bus_error_enable, BOOL block_end_enable, BOOL align64_enable)
01322 {
01323         UINT16 set_msk= 0;
01324         UINT16 clear_msk= 0;
01325         
01326         //
01327         // Bus error
01328         set_msk|= ( bus_error_enable)? CVT_V792_CTRL1_BERR_ENABLE_MSK: 0;
01329         clear_msk|= ( bus_error_enable)? 0: CVT_V792_CTRL1_BERR_ENABLE_MSK;
01330         //
01331         // Block end
01332         set_msk|= ( block_end_enable)? CVT_V792_CTRL1_BLKEND_MSK: 0;
01333         clear_msk|= ( block_end_enable)? 0: CVT_V792_CTRL1_BLKEND_MSK;
01334         //
01335         // Align 64
01336         set_msk|= ( align64_enable)? CVT_V792_CTRL1_ALIGN64_MSK: 0;
01337         clear_msk|= ( align64_enable)? 0: CVT_V792_CTRL1_ALIGN64_MSK;
01338         
01339         //
01340         // bitmask set
01341         if( set_msk)
01342         {
01343                 if( !cvt_set_bitmask_reg( &p_data->m_common_data, CVT_V792_CONTROL_1_INDEX, &set_msk))
01344                 {
01345                         TRACE( "V792 CVT_V792_CONTROL_1 write failed !\n");
01346                         return FALSE;
01347                 }
01348         }
01349         //
01350         // bitmask clear
01351         if( clear_msk)
01352         {
01353                 // clear the enable bit
01354                 if( !cvt_clear_bitmask_reg( &p_data->m_common_data, CVT_V792_CONTROL_1_INDEX, &clear_msk))
01355                 {
01356                         TRACE( "V792 CVT_V792_CONTROL_1 write failed !\n");
01357                         return FALSE;
01358                 }
01359         }
01360         return TRUE;
01361 }
01363 //
01365 BOOL cvt_V792_get_status( cvt_V792_data* p_data, BOOL *p_is_data_ready, BOOL *p_is_busy, BOOL *p_is_term_on, BOOL *p_is_buffer_full)
01366 {
01367         UINT16 reg_value= 0;
01368         //
01369         // read status register 1
01370         if( !cvt_read_reg( &p_data->m_common_data, CVT_V792_STATUS_1_INDEX, &reg_value))
01371         {
01372                 TRACE( "V792 CVT_V792_STATUS_1 read failed !\n");
01373                 return FALSE;
01374         }
01375         *p_is_data_ready= ( reg_value& CVT_V792_STS1_DREADY_MSK)? TRUE: FALSE;
01376         *p_is_busy= ( reg_value& CVT_V792_STS1_BUSY_MSK)? TRUE: FALSE;
01377         *p_is_term_on= ( reg_value& CVT_V792_STS1_TERM_ON_MSK)? TRUE: FALSE;
01378         //
01379         // read status register 2
01380         if( !cvt_read_reg( &p_data->m_common_data, CVT_V792_STATUS_2_INDEX, &reg_value))
01381         {
01382                 TRACE( "V792 CVT_V792_STATUS_2 read failed !\n");
01383                 return FALSE;
01384         }
01385         *p_is_buffer_full= ( reg_value& CVT_V792_STS2_BUFFER_FULL_MSK)? TRUE: FALSE;
01386 
01387         return TRUE;
01388 }
01389

01392 //
01394 BOOL cvt_V792_set_crate_number( cvt_V792_data* p_data, UINT8 crate_number)
01395 {
01396         UINT16 reg_value;
01397         //
01398         // Crate number
01399         reg_value= crate_number;
01400         if( !cvt_write_reg( &p_data->m_common_data, CVT_V792_CRATE_SELECT_INDEX, &reg_value))
01401         {
01402                 TRACE( "V792 CVT_V792_CRATE_SELECT write failed !\n");
01403                 return FALSE;
01404         }
01405 
01406         return TRUE;
01407 }

01420                 return FALSE;

01426 //
01428 BOOL cvt_V792_get_event_counter( cvt_V792_data* p_data, UINT32* p_counter)
01429 {
01430         UINT16 reg_value;
01431         *p_counter= 0;
01432         // Counter L
01433         if( !cvt_read_reg( &p_data->m_common_data, CVT_V792_EVENT_COUNTER_LOW_INDEX, &reg_value))
01434         {
01435                 TRACE( "V792 CVT_V792_EVENT_COUNTER_LOW_INDEX read failed !\n");
01436                 return FALSE;
01437         }
01438         *p_counter= reg_value;
01439         // Counter H
01440         if( !cvt_read_reg( &p_data->m_common_data, CVT_V792_EVENT_COUNTER_HIGH_INDEX, &reg_value))
01441         {
01442                 TRACE( "V792 CVT_V792_EVENT_COUNTER_HIGH_INDEX read failed !\n");
01443                 return FALSE;
01444         }
01445         *p_counter|= ( ((UINT32)( reg_value& 0x00ff))<< 16);
01446 
01447         return TRUE;
01448 }
01449 
01451 //
01453 BOOL cvt_V792_get_system_info( cvt_V792_data* p_data, UINT16 *p_firmware_rev, UINT8 *p_piggy_back_type, UINT16 *p_serial_number)
01454 {
01455         UINT16 reg_value= 0;
01456         //
01457         // Firmware revision register
01458         if( !cvt_read_reg( &p_data->m_common_data, CVT_V792_FW_REV_INDEX, &reg_value))
01459         {
01460                 TRACE( "V792 CVT_V792_FW_REV read failed !\n");
01461                 return FALSE;
01462         }
01463         *p_firmware_rev= reg_value;
01464         //
01465         // Piggy back type
01466         if( !cvt_read_reg( &p_data->m_common_data, CVT_V792_STATUS_2_INDEX, &reg_value))
01467         {
01468                 TRACE( "V792 CVT_V792_STATUS_2 read failed !\n");
01469                 return FALSE;
01470         }
01471         *p_piggy_back_type= CVT_V792_GET_PIGGY_BACK_TYPE( reg_value);
01472         //
01473         // Serial number
01474         if( !cvt_read_reg( &p_data->m_common_data, CVT_V792_ROM_SERIAL_0_INDEX, &reg_value))
01475         {
01476                 TRACE( "V792 CVT_V792_ROM_SERIAL_LSB read failed !\n");
01477                 return FALSE;
01478         }
01479         *p_serial_number= reg_value& 0x00ff;
01480         if( !cvt_read_reg( &p_data->m_common_data, CVT_V792_ROM_SERIAL_1_INDEX, &reg_value))
01481         {
01482                 TRACE( "V792 CVT_V792_ROM_SERIAL_MSB read failed !\n");
01483                 return FALSE;
01484         }
01485         *p_serial_number|= (reg_value& 0x00ff)<< 8;
01486 
01487         return TRUE;
01488 
01489 }
01490 
01492 // 
01494 const char * cvt_V792_get_piggy_back_str( cvt_V792_data* p_data, UINT8 piggy_back_type)
01495 {
01496         const char *pback_str[]= {      "[CAEN TAC 32ch - A786]   ","[CAEN PK 32ch - A787]    ","[CAEN QDC 32ch - A796]   ",
01497                                                                 "[INFN TDC 32ch]          ","[INFN PK  32ch]          ","[UNKOWN TYPE]            ",
01498                                                                 "[CAEN QDC-IG 32ch - A863]","[UNKOWN TYPE]            ","[CAEN TAC 16ch - A986]   ",
01499                                                                 "[CAEN PK 16ch - A987]    ","[CAEN QDC 16ch - A855]   ","[UNKOWN TYPE]            ",
01500                                                                 "[UNKOWN TYPE]            ","[UNKOWN TYPE]            ","[CAEN DUAL-RANGE  8ch]   ",
01501                                                                 "[UNKOWN TYPE]            "};
01502         if( piggy_back_type>= sizeof( pback_str))
01503         {
01504                 return "[UNKOWN TYPE]            ";
01505         }
01506         return pback_str[ piggy_back_type];
01507 
01508 }
01510 // 
01512 BOOL cvt_V792_software_reset( cvt_V792_data* p_data)
01513 {
01514 /* Pulses SOFT_RESET_BIT
01515         UINT16 reg_value= (UINT16)CVT_V792_BSC1_SOFT_RESET_MSK;
01516         // write bit set register
01517         if( !cvt_write_reg( &p_data->m_common_data, CVT_V792_BIT_SET_1_INDEX, &reg_value))
01518         {
01519                 TRACE( "V792 SW_RESET write failed !\n");
01520                 return FALSE;
01521         }
01522         // write bit clear register
01523         if( !cvt_write_reg( &p_data->m_common_data, CVT_V792_BIT_CLEAR_1_INDEX, &reg_value))
01524         {
01525                 TRACE( "V792 SW_RESET write failed !\n");
01526                 return FALSE;
01527         }
01528 */
01529         //
01530         // Write SINGLE_SHOT_RESET register
01531         UINT16 reg_value= 0;
01532         if( !cvt_write_reg( &p_data->m_common_data, CVT_V792_SINGLE_SHOT_RESET_INDEX, &reg_value))
01533         {
01534                 TRACE( "V792 CVT_V792_SINGLE_SHOT_RESET write failed !\n");
01535                 return FALSE;
01536         }
01537 
01538         return TRUE;
01539 }
01540 
01542 // 
01544 BOOL cvt_V792_data_clear( cvt_V792_data* p_data)
01545 {
01546         UINT16 reg_value= (UINT16)CVT_V792_BSC2_CLEAR_DATA_MSK;
01547         // write bit set register
01548         if( !cvt_write_reg( &p_data->m_common_data, CVT_V792_BIT_SET_2_INDEX, &reg_value))
01549         {
01550                 TRACE( "V792 SW_CLEAR write failed !\n");
01551                 return FALSE;
01552         }
01553         // write bit clear register
01554         if( !cvt_write_reg( &p_data->m_common_data, CVT_V792_BIT_CLEAR_2_INDEX, &reg_value))
01555         {
01556                 TRACE( "V792 SW_CLEAR write failed !\n");
01557                 return FALSE;
01558         }
01559 
01560         //
01561         // Event Counter reset
01562         reg_value= 0;
01563         if( !cvt_write_reg( &p_data->m_common_data, CVT_V792_EVENT_COUNT_RESET_INDEX, &reg_value))
01564         {
01565                 TRACE( "V792 CVT_V792_EVENT_COUNT_RESET write failed !\n");
01566                 return FALSE;
01567         }
01568         return TRUE;
01569 }
01570 
01571 
01572 #ifdef CVT_V792_USE_DATA_QUEUE
01574 // 
01576 BOOL cvt_V792_read_data( cvt_V792_data *p_data) 
01577 {
01578         BOOL ret_val= TRUE;
01579         UINT32 size_bytes;
01580         UINT32 *buffer= NULL;
01581         
01582         size_bytes= cvt_V792_get_queue_free( p_data)* sizeof( UINT32);
01583 
01584         if( !size_bytes)
01585         {
01586                 // Queue full
01587                 return TRUE;
01588         }
01589         buffer= malloc( size_bytes);
01590         if( buffer== NULL)
01591         {
01592                 TRACE( "cvt_V792_read_data: cannot allocate temporary buffer\n");
01593                 return FALSE;
01594         }
01595         // Read MEB
01596         if( !cvt_V792_read_MEB( p_data, buffer, &size_bytes))
01597         {
01598                 ret_val= FALSE;
01599                 goto exit_point;
01600         }
01601         // Put into queue
01602         if( !cvt_V792_inqueue( p_data, buffer, size_bytes/ sizeof( UINT32))) 
01603         {
01604                 ret_val= FALSE;
01605                 goto exit_point;
01606         }
01607 
01608 exit_point:
01609         if( buffer) 
01610         {
01611                 free( buffer);
01612         }
01613         return ret_val;
01614 
01615 }
01616 
01618 // 
01620 BOOL cvt_V792_peek_event( cvt_V792_data *p_data, UINT32 *out_buff, long *p_out_buff_size, UINT32 *p_event_count, BOOL dequeue)
01621 {
01622         long in_org_pos= p_data->m_queue_ini;
01623         int step= 0;
01624         UINT32 data;
01625         long queue_ptr= in_org_pos;
01626         long out_buff_size= *p_out_buff_size;
01627         long num_word_to_read= 0;
01628 
01629         // scan input stream
01630         while( queue_ptr!= p_data->m_queue_end)
01631         {
01632                 data= p_data->m_queue[ queue_ptr];
01633                 if( ++queue_ptr>= CVT_V792_QUEUE_SIZE_DWORD)
01634                 {
01635                         queue_ptr= 0;
01636                 }
01637                 switch( step)
01638                 {
01639                         case 0:
01640                                 //
01641                                 // wait for header
01642                                 if( !CVT_QTP_IS_HEADER( data))
01643                                 {
01644                                         // misplaced data ?!?!?
01645                                         // skip it
01646                                         cvt_V792_dequeue( p_data, NULL, 1);
01647                                         in_org_pos= queue_ptr;
01648                                         break;
01649                                 }
01650                                 // Header found:
01651                                 num_word_to_read= 1;
01652                                 ++step;
01653                                 break;
01654                         case 1:
01655                                 //
01656                                 // wait for EOB
01657                                 ++num_word_to_read;
01658                                 // check if EOB
01659                                 if( !CVT_QTP_IS_EOB( data))
01660                                 {
01661                                         // channels data
01662                                         break;
01663                                 }
01664                                 // EOB found
01665                                 // check event count
01666                                 *p_event_count= CVT_QTP_GET_EOB_EVENT_COUNT( data);
01667                                 if( out_buff_size< num_word_to_read)
01668                                 {
01669                                         // p_data->m_queue_ini= in_org_pos;
01670                                         *p_out_buff_size= 0;
01671                                         return FALSE;
01672                                 }
01673                                 // event count matching
01674                                 if( queue_ptr>= in_org_pos)
01675                                 {
01676                                         memcpy( out_buff, p_data->m_queue+ in_org_pos, num_word_to_read*sizeof( UINT32));
01677                                         // p_data->m_queue_ini= queue_ptr;
01678                                 }
01679                                 else
01680                                 {
01681                                         // HACK: debug < or <= condition
01682                                         long first_block_word= CVT_V792_QUEUE_SIZE_DWORD- in_org_pos;
01683                                         long second_block_word= num_word_to_read- first_block_word;
01684                                         memcpy( out_buff, p_data->m_queue+ in_org_pos, first_block_word* sizeof(UINT32));
01685                                         memcpy( out_buff+ first_block_word, p_data->m_queue, second_block_word* sizeof(UINT32));
01686                                         // p_data->m_queue_ini= second_block_word;
01687                                 }
01688                                 if( dequeue) 
01689                                 {
01690                                         cvt_V792_dequeue( p_data, NULL, num_word_to_read);
01691                                 }
01692 
01693                                 *p_out_buff_size= num_word_to_read;
01694                                 // done
01695                                 return TRUE;
01696                 }
01697         }
01698         // p_data->m_queue_ini= in_org_pos;
01699         *p_out_buff_size= 0;
01700         return FALSE;
01701 }
01702 
01704 // 
01706 BOOL cvt_V792_peek_channel_data( cvt_V792_data *p_data, UINT8 channel_index, UINT16 *out_buff, long *p_out_buff_size, UINT32 *p_event_count, BOOL dequeue)
01707 {
01708         long in_org_pos= p_data->m_queue_ini;
01709         int step= 0;
01710         UINT32 data;
01711         long queue_ptr= in_org_pos;
01712         long queue_data_ptr= in_org_pos;
01713         long out_buff_size= *p_out_buff_size;
01714         long num_word_to_read= 0;
01715 
01716         *p_out_buff_size= 0;
01717         // scan input stream
01718         while( queue_ptr!= p_data->m_queue_end)
01719         {
01720                 data= p_data->m_queue[ queue_ptr];
01721                 if( ++queue_ptr>= CVT_V792_QUEUE_SIZE_DWORD)
01722                 {
01723                         queue_ptr= 0;
01724                 }
01725                 switch( step)
01726                 {
01727                         case 0:
01728                                 //
01729                                 // wait for header
01730                                 if( !CVT_QTP_IS_HEADER( data))
01731                                 {
01732                                         // misplaced data ?!?!?
01733                                         // skip it
01734                                         cvt_V792_dequeue( p_data, NULL, 1);
01735                                         in_org_pos= queue_ptr;
01736                                         break;
01737                                 }
01738                                 // Header found:
01739                                 num_word_to_read= 1;
01740                                 queue_data_ptr= queue_ptr;
01741                                 ++step;
01742                                 break;
01743                         case 1:
01744                                 //
01745                                 // wait for EOB
01746                                 // check if EOB
01747                                 if( !CVT_QTP_IS_EOB( data))
01748                                 {
01749                                         ++num_word_to_read;
01750                                         // channels data
01751                                         break;
01752                                 }
01753                                 // EOB found
01754                                 // check event count
01755                                 *p_event_count= CVT_QTP_GET_EOB_EVENT_COUNT( data);
01756                                 {
01757                                         int count_word; 
01758                                         *p_out_buff_size= 0;
01759                                         for( count_word= 0; count_word< num_word_to_read; count_word++)
01760                                         {
01761                                                 data= p_data->m_queue[ queue_data_ptr];
01762                                                 if( ++queue_data_ptr>= CVT_V792_QUEUE_SIZE_DWORD)
01763                                                 {
01764                                                         queue_data_ptr= 0;
01765                                                 }
01766                                                 
01767                                                 if( ( data& CVT_QTP_DATA_TYPE_MSK)== CVT_QTP_DATUM)
01768                                                 {
01769                                                         // DATUM
01770                                                         int ch= -1;
01771                                                         UINT32 geo;
01772                                                         UINT32 adc;
01773                                                         UINT32 un;
01774                                                         UINT32 ov;
01775 
01776                                                         switch ( p_data->m_type) 
01777                                                         {
01778                                                         case CVT_V792_TYPE_A:
01779                                                                 ch= CVT_V792A_GET_DATUM_CH( data);
01780                                                                 geo= CVT_V792_GET_DATUM_GEO( data);
01781                                                                 adc= CVT_V792_GET_DATUM_ADC( data);
01782                                                                 un= CVT_V792_GET_DATUM_UN( data);
01783                                                                 ov= CVT_V792_GET_DATUM_OV( data);
01784                                                                 break;
01785                                                         case CVT_V792_TYPE_N:
01786                                                                 ch= CVT_V792N_GET_DATUM_CH( data);
01787                                                                 geo= CVT_V792_GET_DATUM_GEO( data);
01788                                                                 adc= CVT_V792_GET_DATUM_ADC( data);
01789                                                                 un= CVT_V792_GET_DATUM_UN( data);
01790                                                                 ov= CVT_V792_GET_DATUM_OV( data);
01791                                                                 break;
01792                                                         case CVT_V965:
01793                                                                 ch= CVT_V965_GET_DATUM_CH( data);
01794                                                                 geo= CVT_V965_GET_DATUM_GEO( data);
01795                                                                 adc= CVT_V965_GET_DATUM_ADC( data);
01796                                                                 un= CVT_V965_GET_DATUM_UN( data);
01797                                                                 ov= CVT_V965_GET_DATUM_OV( data);
01798                                                                 break;
01799                                                         case CVT_V965_TYPE_A:
01800                                                                 ch= CVT_V965A_GET_DATUM_CH( data);
01801                                                                 geo= CVT_V965_GET_DATUM_GEO( data);
01802                                                                 adc= CVT_V965_GET_DATUM_ADC( data);
01803                                                                 un= CVT_V965_GET_DATUM_UN( data);
01804                                                                 ov= CVT_V965_GET_DATUM_OV( data);
01805                                                                 break;
01806                                                         case CVT_V785_TYPE_A:
01807                                                                 ch= CVT_V785A_GET_DATUM_CH( data);
01808                                                                 geo= CVT_V785_GET_DATUM_GEO( data);
01809                                                                 adc= CVT_V785_GET_DATUM_ADC( data);
01810                                                                 un= CVT_V785_GET_DATUM_UN( data);
01811                                                                 ov= CVT_V785_GET_DATUM_OV( data);
01812                                                                 break;
01813                                                         case CVT_V785_TYPE_N:
01814                                                                 ch= CVT_V785N_GET_DATUM_CH( data);
01815                                                                 geo= CVT_V785_GET_DATUM_GEO( data);
01816                                                                 adc= CVT_V785_GET_DATUM_ADC( data);
01817                                                                 un= CVT_V785_GET_DATUM_UN( data);
01818                                                                 ov= CVT_V785_GET_DATUM_OV( data);
01819                                                                 break;
01820                                                         case CVT_V1785:
01821                                                                 ch= CVT_V1785_GET_DATUM_CH( data);
01822                                                                 geo= CVT_V1785_GET_DATUM_GEO( data);
01823                                                                 adc= CVT_V1785_GET_DATUM_ADC( data);
01824                                                                 un= CVT_V1785_GET_DATUM_UN( data);
01825                                                                 ov= CVT_V1785_GET_DATUM_OV( data);
01826                                                                 break;
01827                                                         case CVT_V775_TYPE_A:
01828                                                                 ch= CVT_V775A_GET_DATUM_CH( data);
01829                                                                 geo= CVT_V775_GET_DATUM_GEO( data);
01830                                                                 adc= CVT_V775_GET_DATUM_ADC( data);
01831                                                                 un= CVT_V775_GET_DATUM_UN( data);
01832                                                                 ov= CVT_V775_GET_DATUM_OV( data);
01833                                                                 break;
01834                                                         case CVT_V775_TYPE_N:
01835                                                                 ch= CVT_V775N_GET_DATUM_CH( data);
01836                                                                 geo= CVT_V775_GET_DATUM_GEO( data);
01837                                                                 adc= CVT_V775_GET_DATUM_ADC( data);
01838                                                                 un= CVT_V775_GET_DATUM_UN( data);
01839                                                                 ov= CVT_V775_GET_DATUM_OV( data);
01840                                                                 break;
01841                                                         default:
01842                                                                 // Unmatched case !??!
01843                                                                 TRACE1( "cvt_V792_peek_channel_data: bad board type: %d\n", p_data->m_type);
01844                                                                 *p_out_buff_size= 0;
01845                                                                 return FALSE;
01846                                                         }
01847                                                         if( ch!= (int)channel_index)
01848                                                         {
01849                                                                 continue;
01850                                                         }
01851                                                         // Store the adc value
01852                                                         if( out_buff_size< ( *p_out_buff_size)+ 1)
01853                                                         {
01854                                                                 // p_data->m_queue_ini= in_org_pos;
01855                                                                 *p_out_buff_size= 0;
01856                                                                 return FALSE;
01857                                                         }
01858                                                         out_buff[ (*p_out_buff_size)++]= (UINT16)adc;
01859                                                 }
01860                                         }
01861                                 }
01862                                 if( dequeue) 
01863                                 {
01864                                         cvt_V792_dequeue( p_data, NULL, num_word_to_read);
01865                                 }
01866                                 // done
01867                                 return TRUE;
01868                 }
01869         }
01870         // p_data->m_queue_ini= in_org_pos;
01871         *p_out_buff_size= 0;
01872         return FALSE;
01873 }
01874 
01876 // 
01878 BOOL cvt_V792_inqueue( cvt_V792_data* p_data, const UINT32* in_buff, UINT32 in_buff_size)
01879 {
01880         if( !in_buff_size)
01881                 return TRUE;
01882         if( cvt_V792_get_queue_free( p_data)< (long)in_buff_size)
01883         {
01884                 // No enough free space
01885                 return FALSE;
01886         }
01887         if( p_data->m_queue_end+ in_buff_size< CVT_V792_QUEUE_SIZE_DWORD)
01888         {
01889                 memcpy( p_data->m_queue+ p_data->m_queue_end, in_buff, in_buff_size*sizeof( UINT32));
01890                 p_data->m_queue_end+= in_buff_size;
01891         }
01892         else
01893         {
01894                 long first_block_word= CVT_V792_QUEUE_SIZE_DWORD- p_data->m_queue_end;
01895                 long second_block_word= in_buff_size- first_block_word;
01896                 memcpy( p_data->m_queue+ p_data->m_queue_end, in_buff, first_block_word* sizeof(UINT32));
01897                 memcpy( p_data->m_queue, in_buff+ first_block_word, second_block_word* sizeof(UINT32));
01898                 p_data->m_queue_end= second_block_word;
01899         }
01900         return TRUE;
01901 }
01902 
01904 // 
01906 BOOL cvt_V792_dequeue( cvt_V792_data* p_data, UINT32 *out_buff, UINT32 out_buff_size)
01907 {
01908         if( !out_buff_size)
01909                 return TRUE;
01910         if( cvt_V792_get_queue_length( p_data)< (long)out_buff_size)
01911         {
01912                 // No enough data
01913                 return FALSE;
01914         }
01915         if( p_data->m_queue_ini+ out_buff_size< CVT_V792_QUEUE_SIZE_DWORD)
01916         {
01917                 if( out_buff)
01918                 {
01919                         memcpy( out_buff, p_data->m_queue+ p_data->m_queue_ini, out_buff_size*sizeof( UINT32));
01920                 }
01921                 p_data->m_queue_ini+= out_buff_size;
01922         }
01923         else
01924         {
01925                 long first_block_word= CVT_V792_QUEUE_SIZE_DWORD- p_data->m_queue_ini;
01926                 long second_block_word= out_buff_size- first_block_word;
01927                 if( out_buff)
01928                 {
01929                         memcpy( out_buff, p_data->m_queue+ p_data->m_queue_ini, first_block_word* sizeof(UINT32));
01930                         memcpy( out_buff+ first_block_word, p_data->m_queue, second_block_word* sizeof(UINT32));
01931                 }
01932                 p_data->m_queue_ini= second_block_word;
01933         }
01934         return TRUE;
01935 }
01936 
01938 // 
01940 long cvt_V792_get_queue_free( cvt_V792_data* p_data)
01941 {
01942         return (long)CVT_V792_QUEUE_SIZE_DWORD- (( p_data->m_queue_end- p_data->m_queue_ini+ CVT_V792_QUEUE_SIZE_DWORD)%CVT_V792_QUEUE_SIZE_DWORD);
01943 }
01944 
01946 // 
01948 long cvt_V792_get_queue_length( cvt_V792_data* p_data)
01949 {
01950         return (long)(( p_data->m_queue_end- p_data->m_queue_ini+ CVT_V792_QUEUE_SIZE_DWORD)%CVT_V792_QUEUE_SIZE_DWORD);
01951 }

01956 //
01958 BOOL cvt_V792_set_MCST_CBLT( cvt_V792_data* p_data, UINT8 address, MCST_CBLT_board_pos pos)
01959 {
01960         UINT16 reg_value;
01961         //
01962         // MCST/CBLT address register
01963         reg_value= address;
01964         if( !cvt_write_reg( &p_data->m_common_data, CVT_V792_MCST_CBLT_ADDRESS_INDEX, &reg_value))
01965         {
01966                 TRACE( "V792 CVT_V792_MCST_CBLT_ADDRESS write failed !\n");
01967                 return FALSE;
01968         }
01969         //
01970         // MCST/CBLT control register
01971         switch( pos)
01972         {
01973         case MCST_CBLT_board_pos_first:
01974                 reg_value= CVT_V792_MCCTRL_FIRST_BOARD_MSK;
01975                 break;
01976         case MCST_CBLT_board_pos_mid:
01977                 reg_value= CVT_V792_MCCTRL_MID_BOARD_MSK;
01978                 break;
01979         case MCST_CBLT_board_pos_last:
01980                 reg_value= CVT_V792_MCCTRL_LAST_BOARD_MSK;
01981                 break;
01982         case MCST_CBLT_board_disabled:
01983                 reg_value= CVT_V792_MCCTRL_DISABLED_BOARD_MSK;
01984                 break;
01985         default:
01986                 TRACE1( "V792 cvt_V792_set_MCST_CBLT bad position indentifier '%d'!\n", pos);
01987                 return FALSE;
01988         }
01989         if( !cvt_write_reg( &p_data->m_common_data, CVT_V792_MCST_CBLT_CTRL_INDEX, &reg_value))
01990         {
01991                 TRACE( "V792 CVT_V792_MCST_CBLT_CTRL write failed !\n");
01992                 return FALSE;
01993         }
01994 
01995         return TRUE;
01996 }
